sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Calendar, Clock, CheckCircle, PlusCircle, Trash2, Edit3, } from "lucide-react"; function Dashboard({ tasks, studyStats, aiSuggestion, getStudyTips, generateSchedule, setActiveTab, toggleTaskComplete, deleteTask, currentTheme, logStudyHours, }) { const isDarkMode = currentTheme === "Dark Mode"; const isOceanBreeze = currentTheme === "Ocean Breeze"; const isLightMode = currentTheme === "Light Mode"; const isSunsetGlow = currentTheme === "Sunset Glow"; const isForestWhisper = currentTheme === "Forest Whisper"; const upcomingTasks = tasks.filter((task) => !task.completed).slice(0, 3); const [hoursInput, setHoursInput] = useState(""); const handleLogHours = () => { const hours = parseFloat(hoursInput); if (isNaN(hours) || hours <= 0) { return; // Error handling is managed in Layout.jsx } logStudyHours(hours); setHoursInput(""); }; return (
{/* AI Assistant Card */}

AI Study Assistant

{aiSuggestion ? (
{aiSuggestion}
) : (
)}
{/* Stats Cards */}

Study Hours

{studyStats.totalHours}h

setHoursInput(e.target.value)} min="0" step="0.5" />

Tasks Completed

{studyStats.completedTasks}

Study Streak

{studyStats.streak} days

{[1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7].map((day) => (
{day}
))}
{/* Upcoming Tasks */}

Upcoming Tasks

{upcomingTasks.map((task) => (

{task.title}

Due: {task.dueDate}
))} {upcomingTasks.length === 0 && (
No upcoming tasks. Add one below!
)}
); } export default Dashboard;
